title: How do I make Google Pay operate only when phone is locked?
content: Google pay on Pixel 3 XL now works when screen is locked. It used to require an unlock using fingerprint sensor. How do I go back to this state? I only want Google Pay to operate when phone is unlocked. I assume this has changed because of a software update on the phone. I can't find a way to change this setting.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
